item.title: Framework for Question-Answering in Sanskrit through Automated Construction of Knowledge Graphs
item.description: <!-- Supplementary notes can be added here, including [code, math, and images](https://wowchemy.com/docs/writing-markdown-latex/). -->

item.title: Sanskrit Question Answering
item.description:
Sanskrit (Saṃskṛta) enjoys one of the largest and most varied literature in the whole world. Extracting the knowledge from it, however, is a challenging task due to multiple reasons including complexity of the language and paucity of standard natural language processing tools.

In this project, we target the problem of building general purpose knowledge graphs (KG) from Sanskrit texts as well as building natural language question answering systems on top of the constructed KGs.
